Blastp braker predicted proteins for each long read isolate for mat genes in Pyrenophora teres

EMETT52 has Mat-1
CHIP77 and NGKOG have MAT-2

EMETT52 Mat-1
```
>g7228.t1

```
CHIP77 Mat-2

```
>g7151.t1

```

Next query all spades assemblies for each mat locus with a tblastn search
e.g.
```
for file in assemblies/*fasta; do echo -en "$(basename $file | sed 's/.fasta//1')\t"; tblastn -db $file -query Mat-1_emett52.fasta -outfmt 6 -evalue 1e-10 | head -1; echo ""; done | awk 'NF' > mat1_blastout
for file in assemblies/*fasta; do echo -en "$(basename $file | sed 's/.fasta//1')\t"; tblastn -db $file -query Mat-2_chip77.fasta -outfmt 6 -evalue 1e-10 | head -1; echo ""; done | awk 'NF' > mat2_blastout
```
All samples have either Mat-1 or Mat-2
